attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
1)There should be no parole and you serve the entire sentence handed out by the judge.
2)Guitly pleas do not get reduced sentences.
3)The sentence of life SHOULD MEAN LIFE
4)Repeat ofenders for the same crime should have their sentences increased every time that offence is commited.
5)People should not be put in jail for petty offences such as non payal of taxes etc
6)People in jail should have all rights cut including drugs,television, newspapers and meals that only give them basic nutritional value
7)Bring back the death sentence for serial killers and those who repeatedly murder.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
